summary: SummaryFormulated for oily and acne-prone skin, Hanskin's Pore Cleansing Balm BHA removes makeup, purifies pores and prevents congestion in a single step.
details: DetailsBenefitsThoroughly removes makeup, including waterproof makeupA blend of nourishing oils softens and maintains skin health and hydrationSalicylic acid helps dissolve sebum and keep pores clearSolid balm texture makes it mess-free, spill-proof and travel-friendlyGreat for oily and acne-prone skin typesKey IngredientsSalicylic Acid: A beta hydroxy acid that dissolves excess sebum that causes breakoutsOrange Peel Oil: A refreshing fruit extract packed with antioxidantsJojoba Oil: A plant-based oil that improves skin texture and hydrationEucalyptus Oil: A purifying plant extract that gives skin a fresh feelingFormulated WithoutParabensDyesArtificial FragrancesAlcoholItem 2551560How To UseUse it as the first step in your double cleansing routine. Warm a small scoop of the cleansing balm between dry palms and massage over dry skin. Wet your hands with a little water and massage the face to emulsify the oil. Rinse well with warm water and pat dry. Follow with a water-based cleanser.Precautions: For external use only. Do not get into eyes.IngredientsMineral Oil, Ethylhexyl Stearate, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, PEG-20 Glyceryl Triisostearate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Polyethylene, C13-15 Alkane, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, PEG-10 Isostearate, Trihydroxystearin, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Salicylic Acid, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use it as the first step in your double cleansing routine. Warm a small scoop of the cleansing balm between dry palms and massage over dry skin. Wet your hands with a little water and massage the face to emulsify the oil. Rinse well with warm water and pat dry. Follow with a water-based cleanser.Precautions: For external use only. Do not get into eyes.

reviews.headline: No Improvements or Changes Noticed
reviews.comments: I wanted to like this product and was hopeful it did what was advertised. However I saw no changes or improvements to my skin. If it was "pore cleansing" this cleansing balm didn't do much for me. This is coming from someone with oily/combo skin. It was a bummer this product fell short and didn't improved my skin over all with the gentle BHA exfoliant. However I hope it is a 5-star hit with you!

reviews.headline: Love the product
reviews.comments: This product is very good for my face, don't find many that I can use.

reviews.headline: Tried bc of good reviews
reviews.comments: I was on the hunt for the perfect oil cleanser for my oily combo skin. I tried this beacuse of the reviwes and the exfoliation properties intrigued me . This oil cleanser is great because a little goes a long way when wearing minimal makeup and is a total pore cleanser oil cleanser. This saves my skin from the cystic breakouts by deeply cleansing, exfoliating without the dryness. I wouldnt recommend this product for people who have super sensitive skin because of the BHA,if they plan on using it for a daily oil cleanse but if maybe a weekly cleansing. Other than that I believe its sutible for all other skin types.

reviews.headline: So glad I splurged!! :)
reviews.comments: This has been on my radar for over a year and I finally bought it. NOTHING cleans out my pores the way this does--it was almost gross watching it work at first. My pores have shrunk, my skin feels so much better, and the texture has never been better.

reviews.headline: Only used 2x - verdict is still out
reviews.comments: I have combo acne prone skin. I used this as the 1st step to remove sunscreen. I followed my regular routine and woke-up with the most greasy face ever. I used my finger and wiped off the oil from my cheek and my fingers were shiny and oily. I could see my shiny cheeks in the mirror as I brushed my teeth. However, this did remove my sunscreen, so there's that.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Absolutely love this. Melts away make up without issues with getting in eyes

reviews.headline: My favorite cleansing balm!
reviews.comments: The balm is highly effective.  Leaves my skin clean. Great price compared to similar products.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: I wasn't sure what I was going to expect. I wanted this product to work, but unfortunately it wasn't for me. It felt soft on the skin but immediately after I applied and rinsed with water, my skin was red, almost like I scrub my face with pomade. It was like an allergic reaction. I use the clinique version, and I have never had a skin reaction. I don't think this is good for very sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Love It but Can't Use It
reviews.comments: This product was wonderful on smoothing out my forehead texture, and evening out my T Zone. Unfortunately, it also caused almost immediate breakouts in my hairline. I was even extra careful and only used the product on my T Zone, but still got painful bumps in my hairline. I wish I could use this because it does work!!!

reviews.headline: takes off waterproof mascara
reviews.comments: it takes off waterproof mascara better than Clinique Take the Day Off or It Cosmetics bye bye makeup. It has a lemony scent but it doesn't bother me.

reviews.headline: Love this cleansing balm!
reviews.comments: I have very sensitive skin/ eczema around my eyes and eye makeup remover and cleansing wipes irritate my eyes. This balm removes my waterproof eyeliners and mascaras with no problems and does not irritate my eyes at all. So happy I found this!

reviews.headline: Not good for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I have eczema and rosacea but also produce alot of sebum on my nose. It was good at removing but it broke my skin barrier in other areas.

reviews.headline: The best Cleansing Balm!
reviews.comments: I got a balm because I felt like one cleanser wasn't taking off enough of my makeup and this was the perfect choice! Almost all of my makeup comes off! This hasn't caused any breakouts and will buy again.

reviews.headline: I LOVE this balm!!
reviews.comments: I have older, acne prone skin with large pores. I break out so easily and was nervous to try. I've never double cleansed before. After finishing my first jar my skin hasn't lookes this good in years!!! I really work it in to get into my pores to help dissolve sebum and build up. I follow with Cerave and a low coat vitamin c serum. I swear I took 5-10 years off my face. Not one break out. My pores have cleared out a ton and look smaller for the first time ever. In the last 2 weeks I had 2 separate people compliment me on my complexion. I almost fell over. Me? Good skin?! I'm so grateful!

reviews.headline: A hidden gem
reviews.comments: This is a hidden gem. I was hesitant to buy this because I've never heard this brand before. After using it for 3 months, I love it. It removes the makeup well and moisturizes my face after the wash. I plan on buying this for my mother and sister.

reviews.headline: Irritates my skin
reviews.comments: I wanted to like this since I'm a fan of BHA and cleansing balms, but the BHA irritates my skin. I wouldn't recommend this for sensitive skin, or for people who already use exfoliants in other parts of their skincare routine. I prefer having a gentle cleansing balm and going in with actives afterward.

reviews.headline: Perfect for my oily skin
reviews.comments: This cleansing balm Takes off makeup and waterproof mascara with ease. I have oily skin and my pores are clogged fairly easily. This balm is so far that works best for my oily skin. I haven't broken out using this.

reviews.headline: Melting magic
reviews.comments: This is my go to cleansing balm. I love the little spatula which makes it super easy to get just the right amount.  It is so satisfying feeling the balm melt as you apply.  It's super gentle too.

reviews.headline: Didn't work for me
reviews.comments: I returned this balm after one try. It cleansed nothing and removed zero makeup, instead smearing a whitish residue all over my face. Not a pleasant experience in any way. Did I get a bad batch? Regardless, I'll stick with other balms.

reviews.headline: Said it's for oily skin but it's great for my dry skin
reviews.comments: It's my favorite nighttime face cleanser because it's oily, creamy, nice and not drying at all. I'm surprised it said it's for oily acne prone skin because it leaves my skin with just enough moisture but at the same time deep clean my pores. It's just exactly what I wanted. My skin always feel smooth after use. It will sting your eyelash pores a bit though so I use coconut oil on the eyes to remove makeup first then use this product around my eyes to avoid the stinging sensation in eyelash pores. Overall it's a wonderful product and my holy grail. Please don't discontinue!

easy application, comes with a spoon!

faceoff_positive.comments: I don't use makeup very often, but I wanted to test the product to see if it really removed all my makeup, and it did! So I know that it works, but I personally couldn't get used to the texture of the cleanser. It's the same texture as coconut oil, so it feels very greasy upon application. The absent fragrance also didn't help make the texture bearable, but after wiping the balm off, my face did feel really soft. It didn't feel like my face was stripped or bare, and it didn't feel dry like how most cleansers make my face feel. I'm giving this product 4 stars because it does work and it honestly makes my face feel really nice after. I just personally don't use makeup enough to make full use of this cleanser, and I couldn't get used to the texture. Overall it's solid!!
faceoff_positive.headline: Not for me but it works well

faceoff_negative.comments: The Hanskin Pore Cleansing Balm helps my face feel refreshed after taking off my makeup, probably because of the chemical exfoliants in it. I like the scent of it (reminds me of the spa) and the sustainable aspect to the product (don't need cotton pads/wipes). At first my face doesn't feel dried out after using it, but after some time it starts to get that skin-tight feeling. The balm does an okay job at removing my face makeup but does nothing to my mascara (KISS ME Heroine Make non-waterproof mascara, which is notorious for not getting removed easily). I still feel the need to double cleanse after, which I would be fine with if only the cleansing balm removed all of my stubborn makeup. I might try using it as my second step instead of the first step in double cleansing to see if it's better that way.
faceoff_negative.headline: Makes my skin feel clean but won't take off all my makeup
